name: Corbins of the Shattered Scepter
description: Seemingly appearing out of thin air, the Corbins of the Shattered Scepter arenâ€™t even sure where they themselves are from. Without a known heritage to lean on, they identify as children of the cosmos. They're also known for their exceptional candescent flashmarble craftsmanship. Now consorting and aligning themselves with the Gibbun leadership, they look towards the future with a glint in their eye. Their future is bright. The only question: what comes next?
